DataElement.preferredName: DART Currently Has Depression Score 11 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of their current feeling of depression, using an 11 point visual analogue scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Distress Assessment and Response Tool Current Has Depression Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A short, self-assessment to measure an individual's physical symptoms, emotional burden and practical concerns that could interfere with their ability to engage in cancer treatment._Occurring in or belonging to the present time._A question about whether an individual has or had depression._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A short, self-assessment to measure an individual's physical symptoms, emotional burden and practical concerns that could interfere with their ability to engage in cancer treatment.

Concepts.definition: A short, self-assessment to measure an individual's physical symptoms, emotional burden and practical concerns that could interfere with their ability to engage in cancer treatment.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A short, self-assessment to measure an individual's physical symptoms, emotional burden and practical concerns that could interfere with their ability to engage in cancer treatment._A depression scale from 0 to 10 on which the patient marks the current level of depression experienced._An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
